channel.title: Please help! cant log on to ANY server!
channel.description: Ok im trying to log on to any server but when i do it says Error connecting to server. must be down. for [i]EVERY SINGLE ONE![/i] even a private one! please help

item.title: Please help! cant log on to ANY server!
item.dc:creator: @shotgunpker shotgunpker
item.description:
@shotgunpker wrote:

ty for the new sig.

Ok im trying to log on to any server but when i do it says Error connecting to server. must be down. for EVERY SINGLE ONE! even a private one! please help

Read full topic
item.source: Please help! cant log on to ANY server!

item.title: Please help! cant log on to ANY server!
item.dc:creator: @Goodoo_dolls Goodoo dolls
item.description:
@Goodoo_dolls wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:2, topic:241893”][quote author=Gibsonlp254 link=topic=318262.msg2524210#msg2524210 date=1226106337]
Ok im trying to log on to any server but when i do it says Error connecting to server. must be down. for EVERY SINGLE ONE! even a private one! please help
[/quote]

Maybe your computer or router is not allowing you to connect to the specified port, check your firewalls and unblock the port you want to access. ;)[/quote]

Fail… When you open a port it allows connections to your computer not the other way around.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help! cant log on to ANY server!
